name: Elephant
interestingFacts: Elephants have the largest brain of any land animal.
An elephant's tusks are actually elongated incisor teeth.
Elephants can communicate with infrasound, which is below the range of human hearing.
Elephants use their trunks for various tasks, including picking up objects, drinking, and social interactions.
Elephants are herbivores and can consume large amounts of food each day.
Female elephants live in close-knit family groups led by the oldest female, while males tend to be more solitary.
Elephants are considered a keystone species due to their impact on their environment.
